Ralink corp.
RT3090 Wireless 802.11n 1T/1R PCIe

Installed in an Asus Eee 1001HA.

The wifi card was working on Ubuntu 11.10, but with problems connecting accationally (on 802.11G networks). After upgrade to Ubuntu 12.04 no wireless networks are found until deactivating and reactivating wireless networking.

Works in Ubuntu 12.10

Here is a post about issues with this wifi card:
http://davidcortijo.wordpress.com/2012/05/07/ubuntu-12-04-how-to-solve-the-wifi-interface-using-ralink-rt3090-card/
